CFM_ROM.synopsis: Karlach has an approval rating higher or equal than 30 and she decides to ask for an avatar to have a relationship with her.
CFM_ROM.how_to_trigger: Have an approval rating of 30 with her and go to camp or use the debug book to force the night.

CFM_ROM_41.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_41.text: Psst! Hey soldier - you aren't asleep, are you?
CFM_ROM_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player is lying on their bedroll - Karlach leaning over [LOGAN] Karlach approaches from PLYR's left side. NodeContext: [LOGAN] Re-record note: Karlach starts by whispering as they wake the PLYR up in middle of the night, and then goes into normal speaking voice.

CFM_ROM_60.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_60.text: I'm buzzing, honestly. I couldn't wait to talk to you.
CFM_ROM_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, Karlach sits in front of them. [LOGAN] Karlach goes from leaning over PLYR, to sitting down in casual pose -- check with Greg for ref. image.

CFM_ROM_74.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_74.text: Heya soldier - I think everyone's asleep. May I?
CFM_ROM_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player is lying on their bedroll - Karlach leaning over.  [LOGAN] Karlach approaches from PLYR's left side. NodeContext: [LOGAN] Re-record note: Karlach starts by whispering as they wake the PLYR up in middle of the night, and then goes into normal speaking voice.

CFM_ROM_55.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_55.text: Hello, you. I've been waiting for this all night.
CFM_ROM_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, Karlach sits in front of them. [LOGAN] Karlach goes from leaning over PLYR, to sitting down in casual pose -- check with Greg for ref. image.

CFM_ROM_94.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_94.text: Isn't it mad? How good life is?

CFM_ROM_83.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_83.text: I know what you mean. When I look at you, it's all I can think about.

CFM_ROM_43.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_43.text: Thank the gods. I was afraid I was the only one. Ten years is a long time to be trapped in the Hells. Ten years without a kind word, a touch.
CFM_ROM_43.context: NodeContext: She reaches her hand out as though to touch you, but stops short.

CFM_ROM_53.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_53.text: When I look at you, I feel real again. Alive. Gods, I want to ride you 'til you see stars.

CFM_ROM_12.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_12.text: You don't have to ask me twice. Let's go.

CFM_ROM_66.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_66.text: You don't mince words, do you?

CFM_ROM_15.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_15.text: Guess not. I just feel what I feel. No sense hiding it.

CFM_ROM_10.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_10.text: Karlach, I like you, but we hardly know each other.

CFM_ROM_69.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_69.text: Not true! I know you're a goblin-destroyer, an adventurer, and most importantly, I know you like me.

CFM_ROM_20.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_20.text: All true, but there's more than that. Or have you forgotten the fine art of conversation?

CFM_ROM_103.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_103.text: Honey, when I look at you, my brain turns to mush.

CFM_ROM_81.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_81.text: You do seem to have the relevant parts of me in hand.

CFM_ROM_84.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_84.text: Oh, now you're just teasing me. Evil.

CFM_ROM_36.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_36.text: Evil would be grabbing you and kissing you with no regard for the consequences.

CFM_ROM_91.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_91.text: We need to find a solution to the 'infernal engine' problem before we get any closer.

CFM_ROM_44.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_44.text: Then let me backtrack and take you up on your first offer. Something about seeing stars?

CFM_ROM_33.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_33.text: Ugh, I'm sorry - I shouldn't tease you - or myself. I'd give anything to touch you, but I can't. Not until I can be sure I won't burn you.

CFM_ROM_2.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_2.text: I'll turn you to charcoal. Guaranteed.
CFM_ROM_2.context: NodeContext: She wants to but REALLY doesn't want to hurt you

CFM_ROM_97.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_97.text: The flames get worse when you're excited, right? What if we cool you down?

CFM_ROM_25.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_25.text: Around you? Tall order. But if you've got an idea, I'm all ears.

CFM_ROM_35.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_35.text: Let's try breathing deeply, in and out.

CFM_ROM_3.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_3.text: In and out, you say? I'd never considered that. But I think I know what you mean. I'll give it a go.
CFM_ROM_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: She begins to flame, but it then dies downNodeContext: Karlach closes her eyes and breaths in and out slowly, calming herself.

CFM_ROM_26.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_26.text: Ugh, I'm terrible at this. What should we do now?

CFM_ROM_39.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_39.text: I know some magic that might help me handle your fire. Let me see...

CFM_ROM_92.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_92.text: Sleep on it, maybe. If you've thought of something by morning, I'd love to know. For now, it's enough just to know you care enough to try.

CFM_ROM_1.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_1.text: We'll make it quick. One tiny kiss, nothing more.

CFM_ROM_71.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_71.text: We can try. But don't hurt those pretty lips of yours, all right? They feature heavily in my future plans.
CFM_ROM_71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and Karlach lean in for a kiss. Their lips touch, and Karlach immediately stars flaming. [LOGAN] V.O Can be delivered up to leaning into kiss, don't need to act going to kiss.

CFM_ROM_0.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_0.text: Kiss her more deeply. Your passion is hotter than her flames.

CFM_ROM_89.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach starts to get lost in the kiss, then abruptly opens her eyes and pushes the player away. Player takes fire damage.

CFM_ROM_6.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_6.text: A little singed, but it was worth it.

CFM_ROM_73.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_73.text: You have no idea. If I weren't so worried about killing you, I'd be in a puddle on the floor.

CFM_ROM_105.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_105.text: No! You nearly burnt my face off!

CFM_ROM_82.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_82.text: I told you, I'm an 'at your own risk' attraction. Make better decisions.

CFM_ROM_72.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_72.text: You can't make me be the responsible one. I'll destroy us both.

CFM_ROM_98.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_98.text: So what do we do now?

CFM_ROM_51.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_51.text: Haven't read a book since I was a kid. Not a lot of exciting fiction in Avernus. Tell you what, you find one you think I should read, and I'll check it out.

CFM_ROM_24.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_24.text: Let's talk. I still know so little about you.

CFM_ROM_21.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_21.text: Please. My life is an instant mood-killer, and I'm enjoying this mood. Maybe even a little too much.

CFM_ROM_49.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_49.text: I'd better head back to my bunk. You might not be able to touch me, but you've given me a lot to... think about.

CFM_ROM_22.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_22.text: Maybe I can't touch you, but I could tell you what I'd like to do with you...

CFM_ROM_48.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_48.text: I like the sound of that.
CFM_ROM_48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player leans in and whispers something in Karlach's ear. She smiles - player is telling her R-rated things.

CFM_ROM_90.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_90.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach leans and whispers in the player's ear. Player smiles and laughs in return.

CFM_ROM_93.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_93.text: I like the sound of that.
CFM_ROM_93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player leans in and whispers something in Karlach's ear. She smiles - player is telling her R-rated things.

CFM_ROM_30.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach leans and whispers in the player's ear. Player smiles and laughs in return.

CFM_ROM_47.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_47.text: On that note, I'd better head back to my bunk. You might not be able to touch me, but you've given me a lot to... think about.

CFM_ROM_99.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach starts to get lost in the kiss, then abruptly opens her eyes and pushes the player away. Player takes fire damage.

CFM_ROM_75.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_75.text: The best worst decision. So what do we do now?
CFM_ROM_75.context: NodeContext: With regret. She wants to kiss you badly.

CFM_ROM_64.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_64.text: This is going a little fast - let's slow down.

CFM_ROM_16.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_16.text: We can try. But don't hurt those pretty lips of yours, all right? They feature heavily in my future plans.
CFM_ROM_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and Karlach lean in for a kiss. Their lips touch, and Karlach immediately stars flaming. [LOGAN] V.O Can be delivered up to leaning into kiss, don't need to act going to kiss.

CFM_ROM_79.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_79.text: Don't tempt me. It isn't fair.

CFM_ROM_19.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_19.text: Maybe we should keep our distance, then.

CFM_ROM_56.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_56.text: We need to find a solution to the 'infernal engine' problem first.

CFM_ROM_17.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_17.text: I know. What I want and what I can have are two very different things.

CFM_ROM_67.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_67.text: I'm just... ngh... combustible. Ten years is a long time without anyone's touch but my own. And when I look at you, I just feel... explosive.

CFM_ROM_86.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_86.text: Sorry, but I'm not interested in you in that way.

CFM_ROM_37.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_37.text: Sorry if I was a little forward. Ten years in Avernus and I guess I've forgotten whatever manners I might've had.

CFM_ROM_106.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_106.text: Don't hold it against me. Unless you want to.

CFM_ROM_58.speaker: Player
CFM_ROM_58.text: I admire your optimism, but is it that good?

CFM_ROM_62.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_62.text: Yes! Soldier, you're saving me. Every time you speak my name, fight beside me, share what's yours, I'm reminded that I'm alive. Properly alive. And free.

CFM_ROM_5.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_5.text: Ugh, GODS, I want to ride you 'til you see stars.

CFM_ROM_45.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_45.text: Ah come on, don't give me that. We're here, we're alive, we're together.

CFM_ROM_68.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_68.text: I never made peace with my life in Avernus. Ten years, and I never accepted that that was what my life would be.

CFM_ROM_54.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_54.text: I held my own against the devils and imps, but they weren't my friends. How could they be? You don't go to the Hells to live. You go to punish and be punished.

CFM_ROM_65.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_65.text: I'm free now. Incredible, isn't it? And I can have whatever I want.

CFM_ROM_9.speaker: Karlach
CFM_ROM_9.text: And right now I want to ride you 'til you see stars.
